Bash(CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES="" PYTHONPATH=. python3 -c "
from src.data.dataset import CriteriaBindingDataset
from src.data.dataset import create_label_mappings

# Check labels in the dataset
dataset = CriteriaBindingDataset(''data/examples/train.jsonl'', max_examples=3)
print(''Dataset examples:'')
for i in range(len(dataset)):
    ex = dataset[i]
    print(f''  {i}: label={ex.get(""label"", ""none"")}, id={ex[""id""]}'')

# Check label mappings
label_mappings = create_label_mappings(dataset)
print(f''Label mappings: {label_mappings}'')
")

Bash(CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES="" PYTHONPATH=. python3 -c "
from src.data.dataset import CriteriaBindingDataset
from src.data.dataset import create_label_mappings

# Check labels in the dataset
dataset = CriteriaBindingDataset(''data/examples/train.jsonl'', max_examples=3)
print(''Dataset examples:'')
for i in range(len(dataset)):
    ex = dataset[i]
    print(f''  {i}: label={ex.get(""label"", ""none"")}, id={ex[""id""]}'')

print(f''Dataset label_to_id: {dataset.label_to_id}'')

# Check label mappings
label_mappings = create_label_mappings(dataset)
print(f''Label mappings: {label_mappings}'')
")
